name: C. Colorful Table
statement:
You are given two integers n and k. You are also given an array of
integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n of size n. It is known that for all 1
leq i
leq n, 1
leq a_i
leq k.Define a two-dimensional array b of size n
times n as follows: b_{i, j} =
min(a_i, a_j). Represent array b as a square, where the upper left cell
is b_{1, 1}, rows are numbered from top to bottom from 1 to n, and
columns are numbered from left to right from 1 to n. Let the color of a
cell be the number written in it (for a cell with coordinates (i, j),
this is b_{i, j}).For each color from 1 to k, find the smallest
rectangle in the array b containing all cells of this color. Output the
sum of width and height of this rectangle.
